author: odoo
code:
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-


{
    'name': 'Belgium - Payroll',
    'category': 'Localization',
    'depends': ['hr_payroll'],
    'description': """
Belgian Payroll Rules.
======================

    * Employee Details
    * Employee Contracts
    * Passport based Contract
    * Allowances/Deductions
    * Allow to configure Basic/Gross/Net Salary
    * Employee Payslip
    * Monthly Payroll Register
    * Integrated with Leaves Management
    * Salary Maj, ONSS, Withholding Tax, Child Allowance, ...
    """,

    'website': 'https://www.odoo.com/page/accounting',
    'data': [
        'views/l10n_be_hr_payroll_view.xml',
        'data/l10n_be_hr_payroll_data.xml',
        'data/hr.salary.rule.csv',
    ],
}
comments: belgian payroll rules                                employee details       employee contracts       passport based contract       allowances deductions       allow configure basic gross net salary       employee payslip       monthly payroll register       integrated leaves management       salary maj  onss  withholding tax  child allowance                     coding utf 8        part odoo  see license file full copyright licensing details
content:
# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-
# Part of Odoo. See LICENSE file for full copyright and licensing details.

{
    'name': 'Belgium - Payroll',
    'category': 'Localization',
    'depends': ['hr_payroll'],
    'description': """
Belgian Payroll Rules.
======================

    * Employee Details
    * Employee Contracts
    * Passport based Contract
    * Allowances/Deductions
    * Allow to configure Basic/Gross/Net Salary
    * Employee Payslip
    * Monthly Payroll Register
    * Integrated with Leaves Management
    * Salary Maj, ONSS, Withholding Tax, Child Allowance, ...
    """,

    'website': 'https://www.odoo.com/page/accounting',
    'data': [
        'views/l10n_be_hr_payroll_view.xml',
        'data/l10n_be_hr_payroll_data.xml',
        'data/hr.salary.rule.csv',
    ],
}
description: Odoo. Open Source Apps To Grow Your Business.
